content:
The wreckage of a whipped enemy weapon damaged the object of critical infrastructure in the Lviv region.

About thisreportedChairman of the Lviv Regional State Administration Maxim Kozytsky.

According to him, this night Lviv was attacked by 11 enemy drones and two rockets of the type "dagger".

“All 11 drones were destroyed by Western Warriors! Unfortunately, the missiles could not be knocked down. Fortunately, it was without the dead and injured, ”Maxim Kozitsky said.

He added that the life support systems of the Lviv region operate in full -time mode.

As reported by the ArmyInform, the Anti -Time Defense of UkrainedestroyedThis night, 58 hostile "Shahmed" and 26 missiles of different types.
title: In Lviv region, the debris damaged the object of critical infrastructure
description: This was reported by the head of the Lviv Regional State Administration Maxim Kozytsky. According to him, this ...
author: Army Inform
